languages.text: "Если оно смотрит в варп, значит оно открыто для атаки из варпа. Не думала, что когда-либо предложу подобное, но... Если мы захотим принудить эту машину к покорности, стоит напасть на нее через Имматериум".

traits.locale_text: "Если оно смотрит в варп, значит оно открыто для атаки из варпа. Не думала, что когда-либо предложу подобное, но... Если мы захотим принудить эту машину к покорности, стоит напасть на нее через Имматериум".

languages.text: "If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."
languages.original_text: "Если оно смотрит в варп, значит оно открыто для атаки из варпа. Не думала, что когда-либо предложу подобное, но... Если мы захотим принудить эту машину к покорности, стоит напасть на нее через Имматериум".

traits.locale_text: "Shereen, such unfettered power simply must be brought to heel! I have contacts in a certain trusted organisation that employs Malateks who are expert at subjugating xenos machine spirits. With a few careful alterations to Null Caliph's algorithms, they will ensure its full obedience to you."

"The soulless half-sentient machines of the mon-keigh are a frightening invention. You should pacify this... entity. I am willing to share the secrets of our race with your machine singers if it helps to seal the monster away."

"Shereen, such unfettered power simply must be brought to heel! I have contacts in a certain trusted organisation that employs Malateks who are expert at subjugating xenos machine spirits. With a few careful alterations to Null Caliph's algorithms, they will ensure its full obedience to you."

"If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

"If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

"If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

"If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

languages.text: “既然它凝视着亚空间，那它肯定很容易受到来自亚空间的攻击。我从没想过我会提出这样的建议，但是……如果我们打算让那台机器服从的话，那就应该通过亚空间发动攻击。”
languages.original_text: "If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

traits.locale_text: “既然它凝视着亚空间，那它肯定很容易受到来自亚空间的攻击。我从没想过我会提出这样的建议，但是……如果我们打算让那台机器服从的话，那就应该通过亚空间发动攻击。”

languages.text: «Si mira fijamente a la disformidad, entonces es vulnerable a los ataques de la disformidad. Nunca pensé que sugeriría algo así, pero... Si queremos que esa máquina nos obedezca, deberíamos atacarla a través del Inmaterio».
languages.original_text: "If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

traits.locale_text: «Si mira fijamente a la disformidad, entonces es vulnerable a los ataques de la disformidad. Nunca pensé que sugeriría algo así, pero... Si queremos que esa máquina nos obedezca, deberíamos atacarla a través del Inmaterio».

languages.text: 「それが<歪み>を見つめるのであれば、<歪み>からの攻撃に弱いはずです。こんなことを提案することになるとは思いもしませんでしたが...あの機械を従わせたいのであれば、非物質世界を通して攻撃すべきでしょう」
languages.original_text: "If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

traits.locale_text: 「それが<歪み>を見つめるのであれば、<歪み>からの攻撃に弱いはずです。こんなことを提案することになるとは思いもしませんでしたが...あの機械を従わせたいのであれば、非物質世界を通して攻撃すべきでしょう」

languages.text: « Si elle est capable d'observer le Warp, elle doit être vulnérable aux attaques qui en proviennent. Je ne pensais pas suggérer une chose pareille un jour, mais... si nous voulons asservir cette machine, nous devrons l'attaquer à travers l'Immaterium. »
languages.original_text: "If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

traits.locale_text: « Si elle est capable d'observer le Warp, elle doit être vulnérable aux attaques qui en proviennent. Je ne pensais pas suggérer une chose pareille un jour, mais... si nous voulons asservir cette machine, nous devrons l'attaquer à travers l'Immaterium. »

languages.text: "Wenn er in den Warp starrt, ist es anfällig gegen Angriffe aus dem Warp. Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich einmal so etwas vorschlage, aber ... Wenn wir wollen, dass uns diese Maschine gehorcht, dann sollten wir sie durch das Immaterium angreifen."
languages.original_text: "If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn er in den Warp starrt, ist es anfällig gegen Angriffe aus dem Warp. Ich hätte nie gedacht, dass ich einmal so etwas vorschlage, aber ... Wenn wir wollen, dass uns diese Maschine gehorcht, dann sollten wir sie durch das Immaterium, das angreifen."

languages.text: "Öteboyutu görebiliyorsa öteboyuttan gelecek saldırılara da açık demektir. Böyle bir öneride bulunacağımı hiç düşünmezdim ama... Makineyi boyunduruğumuz altına almak istiyorsak Tindiyar'dan saldırmamız makul olur."
languages.original_text: "If it stares into the warp, then it's vulnerable to attacks from the warp. Never thought I'd ever suggest something like this, but... If we want to make that machine obey us, we should assault it through the Immaterium."
